bibl.title: Count Ammonios and Paying Taxes in the Name of Somebody Else in the Cadastre from Aphrodito.

series.title: American Studies in Papyrology. Special Edition

bibl.title: Adam HYATT (Assistant Editor), Proceedings of the 25th International Congress of Papyrology. Ann Arbor, July 29 - August 4, 2007
bibl.author: Mirković, Miroslava

bibl.note: P. Freer MacCoull 1-2 (= S.B. XX, 14669). Of the 18 people and the churches that paid taxes to the account (ὀνόματος) of someone else, Ammonios son of Theodosios is recorded eight times.
Mirković Miroslava, Count Ammonios and Paying Taxes in the Name of Somebody Else in the Cadastre from Aphrodito.

Traianos GAGOS (Editor), Adam HYATT (Assistant Editor), Proceedings of the 25th International Congress of Papyrology. Ann Arbor, July 29 - August 4, 2007 = American Studies in Papyrology. Special Edition (Ann Arbor, 2010) pp. 565-572.
